鏥字的基本解释

鏥
xiù
古同“锈”。

鏥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiù］
［《集韻》息救切，去宥，心。］
亦作“鏥1”。
(1)亦作“銹”。金属表面所生的氧化物。铁锈呈红黄色，铜锈呈绿色。
(2)亦作“銹”。生锈。
(3)亦作“銹”。亦形容发黄如锈。
(4)亦作“銹”。农作物生锈病。
(5)通“肅”。参见“鏽然”。

鏥字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏥； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1320第19
【集韻】息救切，音秀。鐵生衣也。或作銹鏽。

鏥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鏥字的起名意思

暂无。

鏥
Basic explanation of words
鏥
xiù
Ancient with "rust".
鏥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiù］
["Ji Yun" to save the cut, go to you, heart. ]
Also known as "鏥1".
(1) Also referred to as "rust". Oxides on the surface of metals. The rust is reddish-yellow, and the patina is green.
(2) Also referred to as "rust". Rusty.
(3) Also referred to as "rust". Also described as yellow as rust.
(4) Also referred to as "rust". Rust disease of crops.
(5) Through "Su". See "Rust Ran".
鏥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Golden Word Department】　鏥; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1320 Page 19
【Jiyun】Relief and cut, sound show. Tieshengyi also. Or make rust.
鏥
